skinsrestorer.help_skin_set_other: Sets the skin for a target player.
skinsrestorer.help_skin_set_url: Changes your skin from a URL.
skinsrestorer.help_skin_clear_other: Clears the skin of a target player.
skinsrestorer.help_skin_search: Search up a skin that you want.
skinsrestorer.help_skin_update_other: Updates the skin of a target player.
skinsrestorer.help_sr_drop: Removes player or skin data from the database.
skinsrestorer.help_sr_props: Displays the target player's current skin properties.
skinsrestorer.help_sr_apply_skin: Re-apply the skin for target player.
skinsrestorer.help_sr_create_custom: Create a custom server wide skin.
skinsrestorer.help_sr_set_skin_all: Set the skin of every player to a single skin.
skinsrestorer.help_sr_apply_skin_all: Re-apply the skin to all players.
skinsrestorer.help_sr_purge_old_data: Purge old skin data from over x days ago.
skinsrestorer.error_skin_disabled: <dark_red>Error<dark_gray>: <red>This skin is disabled by an administrator.
skinsrestorer.error_skinurl_disallowed: <dark_red>Error<dark_gray>: <red>This domain has not been allowed by the administrator.
skinsrestorer.error_updating_skin: <dark_red>Error<dark_gray>: <red>An error occurred while updating your skin. Please try again later!
skinsrestorer.error_updating_url: <dark_red>Error<dark_gray>: <red>You cannot update custom URL skins! <newline><red>Request again using /skin url
skinsrestorer.error_updating_customskin: <dark_red>Error<dark_gray>: <red>Skin cannot be updated because its custom.
skinsrestorer.error_invalid_urlskin: <dark_red>Error<dark_gray>: <red>Invalid skin URL or format, <newline><red>Try uploading your skin to imgur and right click 'copy image address' <newline><red>For guide see: <red><underlined>skinsrestorer.net/skinurl
skinsrestorer.error_ms_full: <dark_red>Error<dark_gray>: <red>MineSkin API timed out while uploading your <red>skin. Please try again later.
skinsrestorer.error_ms_api_failed: <dark_red>Error<dark_gray>: <red>MineSkin API is overloaded, please try again later!
skinsrestorer.error_ms_api_key_invalid: <dark_red>Error<dark_gray>: <red>Invalid MineSkin API key!, contact the server owner about this!
skinsrestorer.not_connected_to_server: <red>You are not connected to any server.
skinsrestorer.admincommand_status_checki: <gray>Checking needed services for SR to work properly...
skinsrestorer.admincommand_status_workin: <green>The plugin is currently in a working state.
skinsrestorer.admincommand_status_broken: <red>The plugin currently cannot fetch new skins.<newline>Connection is likely blocked because of firewall.<newline>Please See https://skinsrestorer.net/firewall for more info
skinsrestorer.admincommand_drop_uuid_err: <red>We were not able to contact Mojang to get the player's UUID
skinsrestorer.admincommand_setskinall_su: <green>Successfully set skin of all online players to <skin>
skinsrestorer.admincommand_purgeolddata_: <dark_red>A error occurred while purging old skins!
skinsrestorer.command_server_not_allowed: <red>Commands have been disabled for the server <server>.
skinsrestorer.player_has_no_permission_s: <dark_red>Error<dark_gray>: <red>You don't have permission to set this skin.
skinsrestorer.player_has_no_permission_u: <dark_red>Error<dark_gray>: <red>You don't have permission to set skins by URL.
skinsrestorer.not_premium: <dark_red>Error<dark_gray>: <red>Premium player with that name does not exist.
skinsrestorer.invalid_player: <dark_red>Error<dark_gray>: <red><input> is not a valid username or URL.
skinsrestorer.skin_cooldown: <dark_red>Error<dark_gray>: <red>You can change your skin again in <yellow><time></yellow> seconds.
skinsrestorer.ms_updating_skin: <dark_green>Uploading skin, please wait... (This may take up some time)
skinsrestorer.generic_error: <dark_red>Error<dark_gray>: <red>An error occurred while requesting skin data, please try again later!
skinsrestorer.wait_a_minute: <dark_red>Error<dark_gray>: <red>Please wait a minute before requesting that skin again. (Rate Limited)
skinsrestorer.sponge_metrics_consent: Dear server admin, in order to help us decide whether we should continue supporting Sponge for SkinsRestorer, consider enabling metrics by executing /srmetricsenable or click this message.
skinsrestorer.skin_search_message: <dark_green>You can find skins matching <green><search></green> here: <newline><green>https://namemc.com/minecraft-skins/tag/<search> <newline><newline><dark_green>If no skins are found, you can always find some skins at https://namemc.com/minecraft-skins/tag <newline>You can set the skin using the skin link:<newline>/skin https://namemc.com/skin/
skinsrestorer.no_skin_data: <dark_red>Error<dark_gray>: <red>No skin data found! Does this player have a skin?
skinsrestorer.info_no_brackets: <bold>Do not</bold> put your text between brackets <bold>< ></bold> and <bold>[ ]</bold><newline>Example: <dark_green>/skin <jebb></dark_green> to just <dark_green>/skin jebb</dark_green>
skinsrestorer.outdated: <dark_red>You are running an outdated version of SkinsRestorer!<newline><red>Please update to the latest version on Spigot: <newline><yellow>https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/skinsrestorer.2124/
skinsrestorer.permission_command: Allows access to the main "/skin" commands.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_set: Allows access to change your skin.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_set_url: Allows access to change your skin by URL.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_clear: Allows access to clear your skin.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_update: Allows access to update your skin.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_search: Allows access to search your skin.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_gui: Allows access to open skins GUI.
skinsrestorer.permission_admincommand: Allows access to the main "/sr" commands.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_set_oth: Allows access to set another player's skin.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_clear_o: Allows access to clear another player's skin.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_update_: Allows access to update another player's skin.
skinsrestorer.permission_admincommand_dr: Allows access to removes a .SKIN file.
skinsrestorer.permission_admincommand_pr: Allows access to get the skinprops of another player.
skinsrestorer.permission_admincommand_ap: Allows access to re-apply the skin of another player.
skinsrestorer.permission_admincommand_cr: Allows access to create a custom global skin by URL.
skinsrestorer.permission_admincommand_ap: Allows access to apply a skin to all players.
skinsrestorer.permission_admincommand_pu: Allows access to purge old skin data.
skinsrestorer.permission_admincommand_du: Allows access to upload server information via "/sr dump".
skinsrestorer.permission_bypasscooldown: Bypasses any command cooldown set in the config.
skinsrestorer.permission_bypassdisabled: Bypasses any disabled skins set in the config.
skinsrestorer.permission_ownskin: Allows access to set your own skin.
